Night Shift watches with his fingers crossed, hoping that Tucson's efforts =
will save Rodimus.  He was right there along with Perceptor, Talon and the =
others.  

" That's right Rodimus, don't ya give up, because all your pals =
are waitn' for ya and we're all pulln' for ya too.  Just think, when you ge=
t back, you can score yourself some SERIOUS PAYBACK for what Hydras did ta =
ya.  Primus knows you're entitled to it."

Rat Trap nodds.

" That's right,=
 Rodimus, you got dissed big time and there ain't no way we're gonna let ya=
 get dissed again.  You gotta come back and teach old lizard lips a good le=
sson in pickn' on someone his own size."

Straight Shot chimes in.

" A fac=
tion is only as strong as a Prime leads it.  You have the strength Rodimus,=
 Tucson knows it, we all know it.  You gotta find your inner strength and n=
ever let go of it.  And by the way, if you quit now, you'll never hear the =
end of it from Tucson." 

Quickstride puts a hand to the glass.

" That's r=
ight Rodimus, you show the bad guys what you're made of and come back to us=
.  You got back bone, I know you do."
